about_the_game:
“If there is a tomorrow”is a puzzle-type Pixel game. The work tells the story of an old man who dies of cancer, comes to heaven, is given time by the goddess to rise from the dead, and then looks for the time stone and accompanies his family. Filled with’60s-era nostalgia, players need to help the old man find the time stone by solving puzzles to survive until tomorrow, while fulfilling the old man’s wishes step by step to uncover the final truth of the story.

More and more empty nesters have become a social problem that can not be ignored. As the game goes on, players will find that the attitudes and behaviors of the old people’s children are quietly changing, until the disappointment accumulates, and this kind of lonely and lonely state of mind slowly turns into an endless nightmare of cannibalism. Can you help the old man escape his nightmare and finally get to the bottom of the story?

If you are a parent and have an old person in your home, treat them with respect, spend time with them, and bring your children home often. No matter where they are, you will always be everything to them, and they will always want the best for you, no matter how much money they have. No matter how many years of accumulated dust at home, they will always wipe your seat in the heart of the day over and over again. If you are a child, then often accompany their grandparents, the elderly they need more is the company, especially the loss of their spouse-most afraid of losing you.
Finally, the game inspiration from real life, I hope you have experienced my game, can have some new insights.

Game features:
Rich puzzle-solving content ups and downs of the plot and reversal of the 60s to modern elements of nostalgia part of the horror scenes and three monsters Ai
